Package project.capstone.Services

Interface BooksServices

@Service @Transactional public interface BooksServices
Service interface for managing books.

  • Method Details

    • addNewBooks

      project.capstone.DTO.BooksDTO addNewBooks(project.capstone.DTO.BooksDTO booksDTO)
      Adds a new book.
      Parameters:
      booksDTO - The BooksDTO object containing details of the book to be added.
      Returns:
      The BooksDTO object representing the added book.

    • deleteByBookId

      void deleteByBookId(String bookId)
      Deletes a book by ID.
      Parameters:
      bookId - The ID of the book to delete.

    • updateBook

      project.capstone.DTO.BooksDTO updateBook(String bookId, project.capstone.DTO.BooksDTO booksDTO)
      Updates an existing book.
      Parameters:
      bookId - The ID of the book to update.
      booksDTO - The BooksDTO object containing updated details.
      Returns:
      The updated BooksDTO object.

    • updateBookStatus

      void updateBookStatus(String bookId, Integer status, Integer rentId)
      Updates the status and rent ID of a book.
      Parameters:
      bookId - The ID of the book to update status.
      status - The new status of the book.
      rentId - The rent ID associated with the book (null if not rented).

    • getAllBooks

      List<project.capstone.DTO.BooksDTO> getAllBooks()
      Retrieves all books.
      Returns:
      List of BooksDTO objects representing all books.

    • getBookByID

      project.capstone.DTO.BooksDTO getBookByID(String bookId)
      Retrieves a book by ID.
      Parameters:
      bookId - The ID of the book to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The BooksDTO object representing the retrieved book.

    • bulkUpload

      List<project.capstone.DTO.BooksDTO> bulkUpload(List<project.capstone.DTO.BooksDTO> booksDTOs)
      Bulk uploads a list of books.
      Parameters:
      booksDTOs - The list of BooksDTO objects to be uploaded.
      Returns:
      List of BooksDTO objects representing the added books.

    • getAllCategories

      List<String> getAllCategories()
      Retrieves all categories of books.
      Returns:
      List of category names.
